title: Im sick of program bots in aram and nomal bots
body:
riot why you doing this to me? just had 3 players in nomal bot game pretty much feed and do nothing eles. 

i reported this before in aram. how they get so high in levels before they banned? one was low level but what about level 19 and 29? you say cant ban them right away. why not theres no reason to let level 29 play 400 plus games as bot! yes im mad my first lost in bots due this. [](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/113601030/201329579?tab=overview)

replies.body:
Yes and who starts the games a real person and the way riot test if the account is a bot is to pm them in game but someone is at the other side of the laptops making sure they can take over if they get a pm. I joust to do it you have any were from 2 to 5 laptops in front of you and if you get a pm. You respond to it this account is mine 100% and I'm not proud of what I did but that's how it works.

I hope this helps the problem is that wen 1 account gets taken down 10 more take its place

why would you care if someone feeds in bots lol, you should be good enough by lvl 15 at least to completely annihilate bots. Also btw lvl 29 might be one level under lvl 30 but the levels dont even matter until it's level 30 so don't say that they're "high" level and shouldn't be feeding. The jump from level 29 to 30 is huge unless you get put in bronze V 0 lp.
